title: FPS Issues in game
body: I have a pc that should easily run league at 144 fps (Gtx 970, i5 6600k, 16 gb of ram) yet after this patch i've been getting less than 60 sometimes.. all help is appreciated guys! also my OS is win 10

replies.body: Thanks for the info, and I'd like to help!  Even with a solid pc, your frames can drop from factors like outdated drivers or bad game files after an update.  My suggestion would be to go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot and tighten things up.  Let me know if this helps!
so these didn't help, are you sure it isn't something on riot's end, i tried a the unigine heaven benchmark and the framerate was normal

If there was an issue with our servers there would be network issues, not really frame rate.  I appreciate you trying, though!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and figure this out together!  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll take a look and get back to you.  See you there!
Thank you for the fast response, i did all of these, hopefully my framefrate will be back to normal, i appreciate your help!
